entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as the husband of Mrs. Weasley and is described as telling amusing stories.

entities.name: delacour
entities.description: Monsieur Delacour is introduced as Gabrielle's father.

entities.name: gabrielle
entities.description: Gabrielle is described as Monsieur Delacour's daughter and Fleur in miniature.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as Gabrielle's equivalent in size.

entities.name: monsieur delacour
entities.description: Monsieur Delacour is introduced as Gabrielle's father.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley and Monsieur Delacour are described as close friends, with Mr. Weasley visiting Monsieur Delacour's sickbed.
Monsieur Delacour is introduced as Gabrielle's father.
Gabrielle is described as Fleur in miniature, implying that Monsieur Delacour has another child named Fleur.
